title: [恐怖地图]GHOST CORPORATION——幽灵公司|害怕
author: Qwe_Sakura
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Qwe_Sakura 于 2020-3-24 17:14 编辑 
GHOST CORPORATION 




file_1584752741000.jpg (128.54 KB, 下载次数: 6)

下载附件

2020-3-21 09:05 上传





什么是GHOST CORPORATION? GHOST CORPORATION是由YOSHIGD制作的一张恐怖地图版本为1.14.2这是他的图的介绍You play as a worker who just got a job in a company called Ghost Corporation.

All you have to do is to enter different tombs and get as many shards out there as possible.

Sounds easy, right? Find out for yourself...

This map was my first attempt on a horror map in minecraft, which might not really be scary, but it creates a somehow scary atmosphere in the level.你是一名工人你在在一家名为Ghost Corporation的公司中工作。  你要做的就是进入不同的坟墓，并在那里获得尽可能多的碎片。  听起来很简单，对吧？但是你需要一个人自己找...  这张地图是我在《我的世界》中制作的第一张恐怖地图，虽然它可能并不是那么可怕，但是却在关卡中营造了某种恐怖的气氛。
我要怎么下载GHOST CORPORATION? One原帖Two百度云盘a3d8
GHOST CORPORATION的特点2 Unique Levels with different challenges and special aspects
5 upgradeable Items with special effects for the player
An Achievement system with 24 achievements in total
3 Difficulties, which adjust the games difficulty to your needs
Custom Sound Effects, Tracks and Textures
这个地图具有2个不同挑战和特殊方面的独特关卡,5种具有特殊效果的并且可以升级的物品,共有24项成就和3种难度，可根据您的需要调整游戏难度你还可以自定义声音效果，音轨和纹理

replies.author: 迷途的路人
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 迷途的路人 于 2020-3-24 17:06 编辑 
You play as a worker who just got a job in a company called Ghost Corporation.

All you have to do is to enter different tombs and get as many shards out there as possible.

Sounds easy, right? Find out for yourself...

This map was my first attempt on a horror map in minecraft, which might not really be scary, but it creates a somehow scary atmosphere in the level.
你是一名工人你在在一家名为Ghost Corporation的公司中工作。  你要做的就是进入不同的坟墓，并在那里获得尽可能多的碎片。  听起来很简单，对吧？但是你需要一个人自己找...  这张地图是我在《我的世界》中制作的第一张恐怖地图，虽然它可能并不是那么可怕，但是却在关卡中营造了某种恐怖的气氛。

红句翻译有歧义 蓝字为补译
改正后请提醒我重查
